Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: நனவென ஒன்றில்லை ஆயின் கனவினால்காதலர் நீங்கலர் மன்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: And if there were no waking hour, my love In dreams would never from my side remove.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A woman is sleeping peacefully, a blissful smile on her face. She is in a beautiful, vibrant dream world ('Kanavu').
Layered_Composition.Midground: In her dream, her lover is with her, and they are in a state of perpetual, happy union ('Kaathalar Neengalar'). There is no threat of separation.
Layered_Composition.Background: The cruel, harsh reality of the waking world ('Nanavu') is depicted as a dark, stormy realm outside the bubble of her dream. The waking state is the only thing that forces them apart.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A lament that if only the waking world didn't exist, her lover would never have to leave her side, as he is always with her in her dreams.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The dream as a perfect, protected bubble of happiness. The waking world as a harsh, external force that shatters this perfection.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Blissful, wishful, a desire to escape reality.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The dream world is lit with magical, warm, and vibrant colors. The waking world outside the bubble is dark, cold, and stormy.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that shows the woman sleeping peacefully inside her dream bubble, with the harsh reality visible outside.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, fantasy realism, with a beautiful contrast between the two worlds.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Contrasting lighting to clearly separate the dream from reality.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Romantic fantasy, illustrating a desire for eternal dreams.

Cultural_Anchors: The dream as a perfect reality

Negative_Prompt: a nightmare, a sad sleeping face, a happy waking world, text artifacts, cartoonish, blurry.
